problem: i am not someone you love and leave i am not some type of experiment you lead i might be broken inside but you cant take it all and lie  because all i wanted was to live a happy life and all i wanted was to live with you or so i thought cause now i know all the things we could have been all the things you could have done if i hadnt been there all of it you didnt care if you would hurt as bad you just did cause now i know the things you do now i know what youve been through yeah now i know now i know now i know  all the things we could have been all the things you could have done if i hadnt been there now i know what youve been through
